message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer suits your needs.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $10,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. Considering your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $9,500. This is my best offer given the value and quality of the product. I hope this meets within your budget.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. How about we split the difference and go with $9,250? I'm really looking for this product, but I'm also trying to stick to my budget.
